statement.p: A floor plan has a \displaystyle{52} : 1 scale. On the drawing, one of the rooms measures \displaystyle{2}\displaystyle\frac{{5}}{{8}}" by \displaystyle{2}\displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{4}}". Show answers to the nearest .01 The actual dimensions would be: feet by: feet. The area of the room would be square feet.
